test_dialog.text: Welcome to the dialog test. This is a simple dialog system to test interactions.

choices.text: Tell me more about the dialog system.

about_dialog.text: The dialog system allows NPCs to talk with the player. It supports text display, choices, and branching conversations based on those choices.

choices.text: Go back to the main topics.

dialog_features.text: Dialogs can also trigger quests, set story flags, and be used to advance the plot of the game. They're a crucial part of the RPG experience.

create_dialog.text: Dialogs are defined in JSON files. Each dialog has an ID, character name, text, and possible choices. Each choice can point to another dialog node.

choices.text: Go back to the main topics.

dialog_storage.text: Dialog files are stored in the data/quests/dialogs/ directory. They are organized by NPC or quest chain for easy management.
